snippet.title: Ruffy and the Riverside Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

Ruffy and the Riverside is a charming mascot platformer where you copy and paste textures to radically change the game world. It was revealed during the Future Games Show Summer Showcase with a funky gameplay trailer. Ruffy and the Riverside is coming to PC and Nintendo Switch later this year, with more consoles to be announced, so get it on your wishlists. 
#FutureGamesShow #FGS
